comments.author: rahulzx
comments.body: congratulations for your achievement , if you  have possibility suggest to go for BrandNew one mate.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: I'm really proud for you, congratulation mate !This forum allows to everyone (that wants to learn, contribute and give their contribute here) to earn a good income from signature campaign ! And, also, for the most poor country, a signature campaign in some cases ismost profitable than a job in real life ! This is simply amazing ! So, just go ahead with your perseverance and continue to grow here, with an higher rank you'll have possibility also to earn more !

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Congrats! Did the store prefer to accept stablecoin? Not the new release of OnePlus but 12GB of RAM made this phone slightly costly. There are some brands that we can see on mobile stores with 8GB of ram that only cost $80. I'm not sure what the difference but they all seem to be faster nowadays maybe if you have installed different apps already, it will have an effect. With 12GB RAM I guess you are planning on play-to-earn games?

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: So you want to say that up until now you didn't have mobile phone at all, yet you managed to lose almost $3k dollars by 2020 on various crypto scams? I mean, I can belive that part about you buying that mobile phone thanks to signature campaign earnings and kudos for that, but this part about being your first mobile phone ever, when you could buy pretty decent new smartphone (Xiaomi for example) for $150 like 5 years ago? Honestly, smells like bs merit fishing story to me.

comments.author: Aikidoka
comments.body: Congratulations on your purchase mate! I'm happy to see that some people are using the bitcoin they earn here to invest in things like phones or laptops that can help them be more productive in the future. You seem to be a hardworking person with faith in your dreams and goals. I believe that signature campaigns could be of great help to people living in third world countries, as they often pay better than some jobs in real life.I love your tenacity, even though you lost a decent amount of money ($3,000), you didn't give up and started looking for more ways to make money. Keep it up and good luck in your future endeavors!

comments.author: KiaKia
comments.body: This story is not adding up for me, if you can make 3000$ in the past you must have added a good time before losing the money.Are you claiming that you never add any smartphone before losing the money and after losing the money? That's not possible. Also, this phone is very costly, why spend a lot of money on a smartphone with 12GB Ram when you are recovering back from your loss? I will also like to ask what your plan is currently, if you aren't accumulating Bitcoin right now you are doing everything wrong. I'd rather buy a smartphone with 4-6GB Ram for my benefit right now when Bitcoin is up for the discount price.Still, I wish you the best.

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: Congratulations on purchasing your mobile phone, this is a great achievement.Hopefully, you can achieve the next achievements that are still your dream.I'm sure many of us have also achieved what we wanted and we still have many things we want to achieve.Continue what you have been doing and never stop to make more money and believe that we can all achieve what we want.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Every achievement is a great achievement for one's life. Everyone has their own. What one sees as happiness, it might not be the same with others. That is why what one sees as quality post in the forum is not a quality post by another person. Op it is only those who understand real hustling in real life would also understand your happiness. I also join other meaningful members in the forum to celebrate with you. Congratulations for the greatest achievement from the forum signature campaigns. ASAP.

comments.author: robattfield
comments.body: Congratulations on your results with the useful work that the forum has to offer, it's great to see that not only OP but many others are able to earn a monthly income from the forum. Although I have also witnessed many other stories of success being able to pay for living expenses, even buy real estate,... but I feel this is really a good environment to bring. work, especially in the situation that external employment becomes more and more difficult, always feel lucky and grateful for what the market has brought.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I have chosen to remain positive in whatever situation I find myself so I'll continue having that same mindset. It's actually a nice thing that you have been able to use the little money you have been able to save from this forum and also from your trading career to buy yourself a new mobile phone. An achievement is an achievement no matter how small it may look, you have started from somewhere and with time and continuous development I'm sure you'll be able to accomplish more. P.s. Reduce the size of the big ass image in op.

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: Just went through your post history and I noticed you have worked for Sherbet for about 3 weeks which the last week you were shot paid, your current rank is worth about 40$ base on the campaign payment 40+40+24 that's $104 from your 3 weeks signature earning, you did not spend a penny from the $104 and you later added extra $46 to your earning to make it $150 which is not equal to the half of the phone price which is $400 like you said. The story look some how weird to me. Congratulations on your newly acquired phone and I wish you more success to your incoming signature earning.

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Quote from: Orpichukwu on April 08, 2023, 03:39:05 PMJust went through your post history and I noticed you have worked for Sherbet for about 3 weeks which the last week you were shot paid, your current rank is worth about 40$ base on the campaign payment 40+40+24 that's $104 from your 3 weeks signature earning, you did not spend a penny from the $104 and you later added extra $46 to your earning to make it $150 which is not equal to the half of the phone price which is $400 like you said. The story look some how weird to me. Congratulations on your newly acquired phone and I wish you more success to your incoming signature earning. Bro I don't think there is need to be such a detective in someone posts that is trying to express his joy in achieving what he has since long for. Anyways the op clearly stated that he has been working hard and maybe he earn not only from the forum signature campaign but the money from signature campaign working here helped him in achieving what he called his dream mobile. Op am very happy for you and like you and everyone else, we all have dreams he or she wants and for me I really want to start a business but am currently struggling due to the high inflation also in Africa but since I found this forum, I have been exposed to so many opportunities and I have also started hoarding some bitcoin through DCA and hopefully I will hold till the next ATH we will experience in the market.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: Maxre on April 08, 2023, 01:53:39 PMAs I was saying that I bought OnePlus 9 pro 5G in used condition that cost me more than 400 dollars and I mostly paid through my Signature earnings and also my trading and also my savings too.@orpichukwu There's no need for the long calculation; OP clearly stated that he bought the phone from his savings, his trading profit, and his signature earnings. What problem do you have with that?Quote from: Maxre on April 08, 2023, 01:53:39 PM I am a student and I have to bear my expenses too. And that's why I am still happy by having my dream mobile to come true.OP, just keep striving for good things, and success will be yours. As a student, paying some bills for yourself is really a good effort you are making for yourself. Also, be more careful so you don't fall into such a scam that you would have to lose up to the amount you lose. Also, be aware of the new email scams that have been trending recently.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on April 08, 2023, 02:36:43 PMCongrats! Did the store prefer to accept stablecoin? No I don’t think the transaction was paid directly in crypto. If the store did accept crypto payments, that important detail would have been mentioned in the OP. The photos look like Binance P2P page, I think OP converted his bitcoins to usdt and then sold on p2p for fiat. Quote from: Maxre on April 08, 2023, 01:53:39 PMI don't know about other countries too and I hope that some of us members are earning more than 1000 dollars plus per month from here. And I can't believe that Signature is a good thing by having high quality post and that helps forum to grow and also sponsors to get their traffic from it. I remember reading  this thread  not too long ago and the OP was very happy as you are now with his first signature earning. At the moment I don’t think there’s any signature campaign that you can earn up to $1000/month. It’s good you have other skills to support yourself, signature campaigns are only part benefits of being a quality poster on the forum, it’s unstable and I wouldn’t take it as a full time job. Congratulations on your new mobile! ,

comments.author: Blurr007
comments.body: Congratulations bro.This might seems small for those that has passed the stage, but it is massive for newbies like me.I love your sincerity about lossing huge amount, not every one would admit they lost, you've come a long way, I hope i achieve same as you.Congrats once more

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Congratulations OP. Being diligent in your work pays. Growing through ranks is not as easy though but the more you grow, the more you get exposed to things and the more you Karen in acquiring knowledge to added to the already existing one you know. I know it is a big achievement for you while for some it is just a mere experience for you but in all, you persevered in the midst of challenges to attain and achieve what you have achieved. Meaningful contributions and educational discussions are very healthy for the platform. The more you  meaningful contributions to the platform, the more your chances in getting a spot in signature campaigns when you apply for them. So I would advise you to keep doing your good work so as to remain relevant here.

comments.author: hZti
comments.body: Great that you can reward yourself with your dream phone for the work and effort you put into this forum and bitcoin! With the payment of your current campaign it also did not take to much time for you to be able to afford that phone, which can be a good thing to know for all other people here. It is always worth it to put effort into bitcoin like the OP

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Congratulations to you mate. We have different dreams and if this phone is one of your dreams, I know what you're feeling right now that you're able to buy it.I've read a lot of good reviews about Oneplus and considering of having it before but then chosen with a different plan and brand.One thing is for sure that someone has to be happy with big or little achievements that they get and celebrate every wins that you get.

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: The way you worked hard is appreciable and with this hard work you dream come true. Signature campaign is very profitable and they provide good sum of money if answered properly. Cryptocurrency has originates new way for all those individuals who have not job instead of having higher education. Everyone who is invloved in it can get advantageous outcomes and also enhance their experience because of the information which people share here.With signature campaign you will be familiar with most of the things which you don't know earlier and also a sum of money which it offers is enough to carry out personal expenses.
